title: As a 1.2 million mastery Morde main, there is only one thing the rework needs to be perfect
body:
I like the rework tbh, despite the fact that he lost the passive and his ghosts from his kit, and while I do like the new design, I really loved his old design, it's what drew me to pick him up in the first place, even though he looked like a discount he-man villain or something.

I know riot stopped making traditional skins for the most part, but I would love a Traditional Morde skin, and I'm not even asking for it to be free. It could be a limited sale skin, or even a loot skin I don't care but I would love to be able to play the new Morde kit with his old design.
https://i.imgur.com/9XOyPQq.png[]

Another thing about this skin is that it could double as a lore skin, and could be the armor he wore when he was alive. Doesn't need new lines or anything like Captain Gangplank though.

Ya I think another reason why the traditional skins were canceled is because they kinda just undermine the entire point of a VGU. They want to modernize a champion and make it almost what the original strived to be. By giving a traditional skin its kinda pointless, for example, when you go from old to new warwick. But, with champion updates like traditional trundle, its an entirely new aesthetic that also serves as some sort of alternate reality trundle. 

A traditional type mordekaiser skin would be great because like you said would work something like Captain Gangplank where it shows an actual evolution of the character.  

(PS what I said about the VGU thing doesn't apply to Galio, they basically made an entirely new champion -.- )
It was more or less that they didn't actually sell very well at the time, so they stopped producing them so they could save resources.

Riot should do traditional skins again, those designs shouldn't forgotten and merely a footnote on a wiki page for some new player to go "Oh, that's neat" and then move on.
